statements: SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, participation_score FROM students WHERE project_score > 90
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice'
SELECT AVG(participation_score) AS avg_participation_score FROM students
SELECT student_name, participation_score FROM students WHERE project_score > 80 ORDER BY participation_score DESC, student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE participation_score < 50 AND project_score >= 70
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE project_score < 60 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_name, participation_score, project_score FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%' OR student_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT student_id, student_name, participation_score, project_score FROM students WHERE participation_score + project_score > 150
SELECT * FROM discussions;
SELECT topic, start_date FROM discussions WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, group_size FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-06-15';
SELECT discussion_id, topic, participants FROM discussions WHERE discussion_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT discussion_id, topic, start_date FROM discussions WHERE end_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2021-09-15' ORDER BY group_size DESC;
SELECT project_name, group_size FROM projects WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT discussion_id, participants FROM discussions WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(participants) > 5;
SELECT topic, end_date FROM discussions WHERE start_date >= '2021-09-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT id, name, email FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM discussions WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM group_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM students WHERE enrolled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT students.name, discussions.topic FROM students JOIN discussions ON students.id = discussions.student_id WHERE discussions.timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM group_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC;

SELECT students.name AS student_name, discussions.topic AS discussion_topic, group_projects.project_name AS project_name FROM students JOIN discussions ON students.id = discussions.student_id JOIN group_projects ON students.id = group_projects.project_id WHERE students.enrolled_date < '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT topic, participants FROM discussions WHERE participants > 5;
SELECT project_name, team_size FROM projects ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT student_name, project_name, topic FROM students JOIN projects ON students.student_id = projects.project_id JOIN discussions ON projects.project_id = discussions.discussion_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM discussions WHERE participants > 5 ORDER BY topic ASC;
SELECT project_name, team_size FROM projects WHERE team_size < 10 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT s.student_name, d.topic FROM students s JOIN participation p ON s.student_id = p.student_id JOIN discussions d ON p.discussion_id = d.discussion_id;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT discussion_topic, student_name FROM discussions JOIN students ON discussions.student_id = students.student_id;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor FROM classes WHERE class_instructor IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(student_id) AS max_id FROM students;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE class_id = 2 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, discussion_topic FROM students INNER JOIN discussions ON students.student_id = discussions.student_id;
